title: Windows 7 SP1 AIO x64 en-US USB3 IE10 Baseline
description:
murphy78 presents Windows 7 SP1 AIO x64 en-US DaRT7
Internet Exporer 10, Network Drivers and USB3 Support Added!!!
The USB3 drivers are not intended for VM support.

No Windows 7 Settings were harmed in the making of this ISO.
No Programs are added to Windows.
No Unattended Settings were added to the installation.
No Registry Settings were modified.

x64 MSDN Sources:
en_windows_7_ultimate_with_sp1_x64_dvd_u_677332.iso
en_windows_7_professional_n_with_sp1_x64_dvd_u_677207.iso
en_windows_7_enterprise_with_sp1_x64_dvd_u_677651.iso
en_windows_7_enterprise_n_with_sp1_x64_dvd_u_677704.iso

Installation Indexes:
Windows 7 Home Basic SP1 x64
Windows 7 Home Premium SP1 x64
Windows 7 Professional / N SP1 x64
Windows 7 Ultimate SP1 x64
Windows 7 Enterprise / N SP1 x64

Release File: Win7SP1-AIO-x64-en-US-Baseline.iso
Size: 3.49 GiB
SHA-1: E6FCE5C16CE5AF981AD503899D64DD5D49007166

Language: en-US (English - United States)

Tools used:
Microsoft DaRT 7 (thx anarchist9027)
imagex for image compression, renaming, and export
dism for MSU KB hotfix integration and mounted file copy
oscdimg for ISO mastering
Added Info folder to Setup dir to annoy credit thieves.

DISM /add-package (IE10 and PreReqs):
KB2670838, KB2726535, KB2729094-v2, IE10.cab, IE10-Hyphenation, IE10-Spelling

Features:
-Internet Explorer 10
-USB3 drivers for major manufacturers for both boot and install indexes.
-Network and WLAN drivers for most manufacturers added.
-Default and Pre-Activated indexes; choose your flavor
-DaRT7 recovery-mode options integrated into boot setup.*
*Simply choose the 'Repair your computer' option in boot setup.
Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset featues extra UI tools for
common troubleshooting issues. It contains many features such as:
Offline System File Checker, Registry Editor, Standalone System Sweeper,
Offline hotfix removal tool, and many more.
-Baseline version to enable smaller downloads for uploaded monthly versions
every month using SmartVersion 3.0 patches. The patches are roughly the
equivalent difference in size from the baseline image to the monthly image.
-UEFI boot information added to ISO boot data*
*Also changed the EFI folder around to allow UEFI USB Flash drive booting

Notes:
This baseline image can be used as is for installs, or as a source for the
monthly patches I release. I've switched to a patch release method each month
since it requires less than half the seeding, and hence faster downloads. The
patches are extremely easy to apply to the baseline image and will not delete
the baseline image if you wish to keep downloading updated versions every month.

Credits:
murphy78 - Integration, ISO design and testing

Enjoy Pirates,
murphy78-TPB/MDL :)
